name: Arturo Fuente - Magnum R Rosado Sun Grown (SG) - R54
brand: Arturo Fuente, Magnum R Rosado Sun Grown (SG)
additionalNotes: Arturo Fuente Magnum R Rosado Sungrown is a special cigar collection series years in the making intended to stand apart from the rest of the Fuente family of cigars. One look at the decorative gold band and luxe box and you already know what to expect. Rosado refers to its rich reddish color from the mature wrappers. Ecuador Sungrown Sumatra, these rare rosie wrappers are aged for nearly a decade,Â giving these cigars a sweet distinct finish and elegant undertones of leather, cream, cedar, pepper and roasted pinenuts. Not too heavy, not too light, but just right.
